name: Dr. Bee's Finger Enlargement Clinic
description:
Bzz! Patients are queuing to your clinic for a chance to get their fingers enlarged by your magical stinger. A handsome reward of flowers and nectar is guaranteed for a careful bee-surgeon. Are you up to the challenge?

The Windows executable offers the full game experience. The HTML5 version of the game lacks a couple features present in the Windows executable -- namely, game pad support and some audio effects.
